Please find the list below - it's updated regularly, please come back later if you don't see a recent mail. mailarchive_home_addmail_title=Add Candidate mailarchive_home_addmail_description=To create a new candidate form, first choose a page name (usually first name/last name of the candidate) mailarchive_home_addmail_mail=Mail: mailarchive_home_addmail_mailsubject=Mail Subject mailarchive_home_addmail_add=Add mailarchive_home_maillist_title=Mail List mailarchive_loading_title=Mailing-lists eMail Loading mailarchive_loading_description=This page will allow you to load emails from your configured mailbox(es). Simulation will do everything except effectively saving mails and topics pages. Checking debug mode allows to set log level to DEBUG for this loading session. mailarchive_loading_action_debug=Debug Mode mailarchive_loading_action_load=Load mailarchive_loading_action_simulate=Simulate mailarchive_loading_action_check=Check mailarchive_loading_confirm=Confirm loading mails mailarchive_loading_confirm_withdelete=Confirm and delete loading mails mailarchive_loading_connect_failure=Failed to connect to mail server mailarchive_loading_failure=Failed to load emails. Check the debug information mailarchive_loading_success=Emails have been treated successfully. Already loaded emails have not been deleted. xe.mailarchive.subject=Subject xe.mailarchive.startdate=Created xe.mailarchive.lastupdatedate=Updated xe.mailarchive.count=Messages xe.mailarchive.author=Author xe.mailarchive.emptyvalue=unknown xe.mailarchive._ratings=Ratings mailarchive_server_states.ok=Ok mailarchive_server_states.-1=Authentication failed mailarchive_server_states.-2=Connection error mailarchive_server_states.-3=Illegal State mailarchive_server_states.-4=Unexpected error mailarchive_server_states.-5=Folder not found mailarchive_server_states.-6=Unknown Host mailarchive_server_states.-7=Unknown Error mailarchive_server_states.-8=Invalid Configuration
